data.chText: 辣椒（经常在干后制成辣椒粉）
data.enText: the small green or red fruit of a type of pepper plant that is used in cooking to give a hot taste to food, often dried or made into powder, also called chilli or chilli powder

means: 辣椒(经常在干后制成辣椒粉)

tr: very hot and finely tapering pepper of special pungency

value.def: Chillies are small red or green peppers. They have a very hot taste and are used in cooking.
Chilli is the same as chilli con carne .
